text: Hum sirf teri hi ibadat kertay hain aur sirf tujh hi say madad chahatay hain Shuroo Allah kay naam say jo bara meharban nehayat reham kerney wala hai 42.1. Haa-meem 42.2. Ain â€“seen-qaaf 42.3. Allah Taalaa jo zabardast hai aur hikmat wala hai issi tarah teri taraf aur tujh say aglon ki taraf wahee bhejta raha 42.4. Aasmano ki (tamam) cheezen aur jo kuch zamin mein hai sab ussi ka hai woh bartar aur azeem-us-shan hai
